title: COVID-19 Vaccine, Bivalent | Moderna
description: Discover the Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine, Bivalent, now authorized for emergency use to boost vaccinated patients.
cleaned_text: Formula) has not been approved or licensed by the FDA, but has been authorized by the FDA, under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) to prevent Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) in individuals 6 months through 11 years of age. The EUA for this product is in effect for the duration of the COVID-19 EUA declaration justifying emergency use of the product, unless the declaration is terminated or the authorization is revoked sooner
